org.doctag.connector

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.connector.Connector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PdfConnector

    public abstract class Connector
extends Object
    Common base class for all docTag connectors.

    A connector processes data in a specific format from streams (e. g. file streams or network streams) and handles reading and writing docTag meta data from and to the streams.

    Typically there's one connector for each kind of file format supported.

    Author:
    Jochen Schalanda

      • inputStream

        protected final InputStream inputStream

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connector

        public Connector(InputStream inputStream)
          throws ConnectorException
        Create a new connector instance processing data from the provided InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream which will be processed
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - If the input stream couldn't be read or the format is not supported by this connector

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public Document read()
              throws DataNotFoundException,
                     InvalidDataException
        Read data from the input stream, parse it, and return a new docTag meta data document.
        Returns:
        The parsed docTag meta data
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - If the input stream doesn't contain any docTag meta data
        InvalidDataException - If the input stream doesn't contain any valid docTag meta data

      • write

        public void write(OutputStream outputStream,
         Document document)
           throws ConnectorException,
                  InvalidDataException
        Write the data read from the input stream back into an output stream while updating the docTag meta data inside.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The OutputStream in which the modified original data is being written
        document - The docTag meta data document which should be written into the originally read data
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - If an error occurred while writing to the output stream
        InvalidDataException - if the docTag meta data document contains invalid data
